title.narrative: DFID Contributions to the OECD Development Centre

description.narrative: This activity (DFID Contributions to the OECD Development Centre) is a component of UK Membership of the OECD Development Centre reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £2,722,191. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Sectors not specified. , with the following implementing partners: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD). The start date is 01-01-2007 and the end date is 31-03-2011.
